   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto >= GETDATE()  - 100) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_dt_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo <> 'NC' ) AND
			( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
			--( nfs.nfs_tipo in ( :a_sNfsTipos ) ) AND 
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mte.mte_serie FROM mte
								WHERE ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
										( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
										( mte.mte_tipo in ( 'C', 'E', 'O', 'D' ) ) ) AND
			NOT EXISTS ( SELECT MNS.MNS_NUM FROM MNS 
								WHERE ( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
										( 8=8 ) AND 
										( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
							         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
							         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) ) 
 -------------- OK  2
UNION ALL 

  SELECT top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,

        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,

        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART Oftalmoclin' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA  
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS,
			mte, 
			rdi,
			pac   
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod ) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo = 'NC' ) AND 
			--( nfs.nfs_tipo in ( :a_sNfsTipos ) ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( rdi.rdi_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
		 ( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_status = 'D' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_tipo not in ( 'E', 'D' ) ) AND
		 ( 8=8 ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_mcc_serie_dep is not null ) AND 
		 ( ( mte.mte_tipo <> 'C' ) OR
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT tca_cod FROM tca
								WHERE ( tca.tca_cod = mte.mte_tca_cod ) AND
										( tca.tca_ind_cr = 'S' ) ) ) OR 
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT udp_valor FROM udp 
								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) ) 

---- OK 3

UNION ALL 

  SELECT  top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART Oftalmoclin' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA 
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
			mte, 
			rdi,
			pac   
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod ) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo = 'NC' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE() - 100 ) AND  
         ( rdi.rdi_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_status = 'D' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_tipo not in ( 'E', 'D' ) ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( ( mte.mte_tipo <> 'C' ) OR
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT tca_cod FROM tca
								WHERE ( tca.tca_cod = mte.mte_tca_cod ) AND
										( tca.tca_ind_cr = 'S' ) ) ) OR 
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT udp_valor FROM udp 
								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) ) AND 
			( ( rdi.rdi_mcc_serie_dep is null ) OR 
			  ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag = 'X' ) OR 
			  ( rdi.rdi_seq_subst is null AND 
				 NOT EXISTS ( SELECT mns.mns_serie FROM mns
									WHERE ( rdi.rdi_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND
											( rdi.rdi_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND
											( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) ) ) ) 
 ------- OK 4
UNION ALL 

  SELECT  top 10 
        nfs.nfs_tipo as NR_TIPO_TITULO, 
        nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_emis as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_dt_vcto as DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_valor as VL_TITULO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_multa as VL_MULTA,   
        cnv.cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO,   
        emp.emp_nome_fantasia as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,   
		emp.emp_cgc AS CONV_CNPJ, 
        nfs.nfs_vlr_iss as VL_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_ir as VL_IR,   
        cfg.cfg_vlrfilme as VL_FILME,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_iss as VL_PERC_ISS,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_ir as VL_PER_IR,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_multa as VL_PERC_MULTA,   
        nfs.nfs_perc_juro as VL_PERC_JURO,   
        nfs.nfs_vlr_outros_imp as VL_OUTROS_IMP,
		nfs.nfs_remessa as NR_REMESSA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as MARCA,
		cfg.cfg_emp as DS_UNIDADE,
        cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,
        'SMART Oftalmoclin' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA  
     FROM cnv,   
         emp,   
         nfs,   
         cfg,   
         MNS,
			mte, 
			rdi,
			pac, 
			rdi b   
   WHERE ( emp.emp_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_cod ) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_SERIE = nfs.nfs_serie) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_NUMERO = nfs.nfs_numero) and  
         ( MNS.MNS_NFS_TIPO = nfs.nfs_tipo) and  
         ( cnv.cnv_cod = nfs.nfs_emp_codigo ) and  
         ( nfs.nfs_tipo = 'NC' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_vcto >= GETDATE()-100 ) AND  
         ( rdi.rdi_vcto < GETDATE() ) AND
		 ( rdi.rdi_forma_pag <> 'U' ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_recepcao <> 'S' ) AND 
		 ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null ) AND
		 ( mns.mns_ind_liberado = 'S' ) AND 
		 ( nfs.nfs_status = 'P' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_pac_reg = pac.pac_reg ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_serie = nfs.nfs_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_nfs_numero = nfs.nfs_numero ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_status = 'D' ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_tipo not in ( 'E', 'D' ) ) AND
		 ( 8=8 ) AND 
		 ( mte.mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( mte.mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_mte_serie = rdi.rdi_mte_serie ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_mte_seq = rdi.rdi_mte_seq ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_seq = rdi.rdi_seq_subst ) AND 
		 ( b.rdi_mns_serie = mns.mns_serie ) AND
		 ( b.rdi_mns_num = mns.mns_num ) AND 
		 ( rdi.rdi_mcc_serie_dep is not null ) AND 
		 ( ( mte.mte_tipo <> 'C' ) OR
		   ( EXISTS ( SELECT tca_cod FROM tca
		 					WHERE ( tca.tca_cod = mte.mte_tca_cod ) AND
										( tca.tca_ind_cr = 'S' ) ) ) OR 
			  ( EXISTS ( SELECT udp_valor FROM udp 
								WHERE ( udp.udp_mte_serie_dep = mte.mte_serie ) AND
										( udp.udp_mte_seq_dep = mte.mte_seq ) ) ) )

SELECT  top 100
  nfs.nfs_tipo  as NR_TIPO_TITULO,
  cfg.cfg_cgc as CNPJ,

  nfs.nfs_serie as NR_SERIE_TITULO,   
  nfs.nfs_numero as NR_TITULO,  
  MNS_DT as DT_RECEBIMENTO,
  MNS_VLR AS VL_RECEBIDO,
  0.00 AS VL_DESCONTOS,
  0.00 AS VL_JUROS, 
  NFS_VLR_MULTA AS VL_MULTA,
  MNS_DT AS DT_ATUALIZACAO,
  MNS_TIPO AS DS_TIPO_RECEBIMENTO,
  ' ' AS DS_TRANSACAO,
   'SMART Oftalmoclin' AS BASE,
        GETDATE() AS DT_CARGA  
   FROM mns ,           
   cfg ,           
   nfs  
   WHERE ( nfs.nfs_serie = mns.mns_nfs_serie ) 
   and ( nfs.nfs_numero = mns.mns_nfs_numero ) 
   and ( nfs.nfs_tipo = mns.mns_nfs_tipo ) 
   and ( mns.mns_mns_serie is null )

properties.description:
Pipeline desenvolvido para alimentar as tableas:

Titulos_receber e Baixa_Titulos_Receber

Iniciado conferencia pelo setor de Contas a Receber das informações alimentadas por Tasy e Smart.

source.oracleReaderQuery:
select '' nr_tipo_titulo,
obter_cgc_estabelecimento(R.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO) AS CNPJ, 
'' AS NR_SERIE_TITULO,
l.nr_titulo, 
l.dt_recebimento, 
l.vl_recebido, 
l.vl_descontos, 
l.vl_juros, 
l.vl_multa, 
l.dt_atualizacao, 
t.ds_tipo_recebimento,
x.DS_TRANSACAO,
'TASY Delphi' AS BASE,
 SYSDATE AS DT_CARGA
from titulo_receber r,
     TITULO_RECEBER_LIQ L,
     tipo_recebimento t,
     TRANSACAO_FINANCEIRA X
where r.nr_titulo = l.nr_titulo 
and l.cd_tipo_recebimento = t.cd_tipo_recebimento
AND l.nr_seq_trans_fin = X.NR_SEQUENCIA

SELECT  
        a.ie_tipo_titulo as NR_TIPO_TITULO,
        '' as NR_SERIE_TITULO,
        A.NR_TITULO,
        A.DT_EMISSAO as DT_EMISSAO_TITULO,
        A.DT_VENCIMENTO DT_VENCIMENTO_TITULO,
        A.VL_TITULO VL_TITULO,
        A.VL_MULTA_FIXO AS VL_MULTA,
        C.DS_CONVENIO,
        B.DS_RAZAO_SOCIAL as DS_EMPRESA_CONVENIO,
        B.CD_CGC AS CONV_CNPJ,
        0 AS VL_ISS,
        0 AS VL_IR,
        0 AS VL_FILME,
        0 AS VL_PERC_ISS,
        0 AS VL_PER_IR,
        A.TX_MULTA AS VL_PERC_MULTA,
        A.TX_JUROS AS VL_PERC_JURO,
        A.VL_OUTRAS_DESPESAS AS VL_OUTROS_IMP,
        0 AS NR_REMESSA,
        EM.NM_RAZAO_SOCIAL MARCA,
        E.NM_FANTASIA_ESTAB AS DS_UNIDADE,
        E.CD_CGC AS CNPJ,
'TASY Delphi' AS BASE,
 SYSDATE AS DT_CARGA
FROM    TITULO_RECEBER A, 
        PESSOA_JURIDICA B,
        ESTABELECIMENTO E,
        EMPRESA EM,
        CONVENIO C
where   b.cd_cgc = a.cd_cgc
AND     a.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO = E.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
AND     E.CD_EMPRESA = EM.CD_EMPRESA
AND     B.CD_CGC = C.CD_CGC
AND     C.DT_CANCELAMENTO IS NULL

select 

'HTML5' as BASE,

p.nr_atendimento,
p.nr_atendimento as nr_registro_unico,
p.dt_atualizacao,
at.dt_entrada,
p.nr_interno_conta,
obter_nome_estab(c.cd_estabelecimento) as ds_estabelecimento,
pf.cd_pessoa_fisica,
pf.dt_nascimento,
pf.nr_cpf,
pf.ie_sexo,
obter_compl_pf(pf.cd_pessoa_fisica,1,'CEP') as nr_cep,
obter_compl_pf(pf.cd_pessoa_fisica,1,'CI') as ds_cidade,
obter_nome_pf(at.cd_pessoa_fisica) as ds_pessoa_fisica,
p.cd_convenio as cd_convenio,
obter_nome_convenio(c.cd_convenio_parametro) as ds_convenio,
p.cd_medico_executor,
obter_nome_pf(p.cd_medico_executor) as ds_medico_executor,
p.cd_medico_req as cd_medico_requisitante,
obter_nome_pf(p.cd_medico_req) as ds_medico_requisitante,
p.ie_origem_proced,
p.cd_procedimento,
obter_desc_procedimento(p.cd_procedimento, p.ie_origem_proced) as ds_procedimento,

'' as ds_classif_procedimento,

decode(c.ie_status_acerto, 1,'Provisorio' , 2 ,'Definitivo') as status_conta,

from procedimento_paciente p,
atendimento_paciente at,
pessoa_fisica pf,
procedimento pr,

where p.nr_atendimento = at.nr_atendimento
and at.cd_pessoa_fisica = pf.cd_pessoa_fisica
and p.cd_procedimento = pr.cd_procedimento
and p.ie_origem_proced = pr.ie_origem_proced
and p.nr_interno_conta = c.nr_interno_conta
and p.cd_motivo_exc_conta is null
and c.ie_cancelamento is null
and at.dt_entrada between sysdate - 1 and sysdate

select 

'HTML5' as BASE,
'' as cd_marca,
'' as marca,
'' as cd_estabelecimento,
p.nr_atendimento,
'' as nr_registro_unico,
p.dt_atualizacao,
at.dt_entrada,

obter_nome_estab(c.cd_estabelecimento) as ds_estabelecimento,

obter_nome_pf(at.cd_pessoa_fisica) as ds_pessoa_fisica,
p.cd_convenio as cd_convenio,
obter_nome_convenio(c.cd_convenio_parametro) as ds_convenio,
ci.cd_medico_cirurgiao as cd_medico_executor,
obter_nome_pf(ci.cd_medico_cirurgiao) as ds_medico_executor,
ci.cd_medico_cirurgiao as cd_medico_requisitante,
obter_nome_pf(ci.cd_medico_cirurgiao) as ds_medico_requisitante,
'' as ie_origem_proced,
p.cd_material as cd_procedimento,
pr.ds_material as ds_procedimento, 
'Material' as ds_classificacao,
'' as ds_classif_procedimento,
0 as cd_proced_principal,
'' ds_proced_principal,
p.qt_material as qt_procedimento,
c.vl_conta,
p.vl_material as vl_procedimento,
c.ie_status_acerto,
decode(c.ie_status_acerto, 1,'Provisorio' , 2 ,'Definitivo') as status_conta,
0 as cd_tuss,
'' as ds_classif_lio
from material_atend_paciente p,
atendimento_paciente at,
pessoa_fisica pf,

cirurgia ci
where p.nr_atendimento = at.nr_atendimento
and at.cd_pessoa_fisica = pf.cd_pessoa_fisica

and p.nr_atendimento = ci.nr_atendimento

properties.description: Pipelines desenvolvidos em conjunto com a empresa Class para a extração das informações de produção. Atualmente desativado.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH db as (
    select 
        top 5
        'Smart HOSL' as BASE
        ,3 as CD_MARCA
        ,'DAYHORC' as DS_MARCA
        ,convert(varchar,osm_serie) + convert(varchar,osm_num) AS NS_REGISTRO_UNICO --duvida
        ,smm_dthr_alter as DT_ATUALIZACAO 
        ,osm_dthr as DT_ENTRADA
        ,convert(varchar,osm_serie) + convert(varchar,osm_num) as NR_INTERNO_CONTA --duvida
        ,smm_num as NR_ATENDIMENTO
        ,case ltrim(str_emp.str_cod) 
            when '18' then 7
            when '9' then 7
            when '13' then 7
            when 'SCL' then 7
            when '901' then 7
            when 'IOF' then 7
            when '13' then 8
            when 'DHI' then 9
        end as CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
        ,case ltrim(str_emp.str_cod) 
            when '18' then 'HBA'
            when '9' then 'HBA'
            when '13' then 'HBA'
            when 'SCL' then 'HBA'
            when '901' then 'HBA'
            when 'IOF' then 'HBA'
            when '13' then 'Itaigara'
            when 'DHI' then 'Itabuna'
        end as DS_ESTABELECIMENTO
        ,osm_pac as CD_PESSOA_FISICA
        ,pac_nasc as DT_NASCIMENTO
        ,pac_numcpf as NR_CPF
        ,pac_sexo as IE_SEXO
        ,pac_cep as NR_CEP
        ,case 
            when isnumeric(pac_cid) = 1 then (select cde_nome from cde where cde_cod = pac_cid)
        else pac_cid end as DS_CIDADE
        ,pac_nome as DS_PESSOA_FISICA
        ,cnv_cod as CD_CONVENIO
        ,cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO
        ,psv_exe.psv_cod as CD_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
        ,psv_exe.psv_apel as DS_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
        ,psv_req.psv_cod as CD_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
        ,psv_req.psv_apel as DS_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
        ,isnull(tab_padrao,0) as IE_ORIGEM_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_cod as CD_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smk_rot as DS_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,case ctf_categ 
            when 'C' then 'Consulta'
            when 'E' then 'Exames'
            when 'R' then 'Cirurgia'
            when 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when 'O' then 'Outras'
            when 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when 'G' then 'Gases'
            when 'O' then 'Outros'
        end as DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_qt as QT_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_vlr + isnull(smm_ajuste_vlr,0) as VL_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,case 
            when smm_fat_serie is not null then 2
        else 1 end AS IE_STATUS_ACERTO
        ,case 
            when smm_fat_serie is not null then 'Definitivo'
        else 'Provisório' end as IE_STATUS_CONTA
        ,0 as CD_TUSS 
        ,'' DS_CLASSIF_LIO
        ,smm_sfat
        ,smm_pacote
        ,smm_num_pai
        ,smm_p_osm_serie
        ,smm_p_osm_num
        ,smm_p_smm_num
        ,smm_hsp_num
        ,smm_rci_serie
        ,smm_rci_num
    from 
        osm
        inner join smm on (
            smm_osm_serie = osm_serie
            and smm_osm = osm_num
        )
        inner join str str_osm on (
            str_osm.str_cod = osm_str
        )
        inner join str str_emp on (
            str_osm.str_str_cod = str_emp.str_cod
        )
        inner join pac on (
            pac_reg = osm_pac
        )
        inner join cnv on (
            cnv_cod = osm_cnv
        )
        inner join psv psv_exe on (
            psv_exe.psv_cod = smm_med
        )
        inner join psv psv_req on (
            psv_req.psv_cod = smm_med
        )
        inner join smk on (
            smk_cod = smm_cod
            and smk_tipo = smm_tpcod
        )
        inner join ctf on (
            ctf_cod = smk_ctf
            and ctf_tipo = smk_tipo
        )
        left outer join tab on (
            tab_cod = smm_tab_cod
        )
    where 
        1 = 1
        and osm_dthr >= '2019-02-26'
        and osm_dthr <= '2019-02-26 23:59:000'
)

select 
    BASE
    ,CD_MARCA
    ,DS_MARCA
    ,NS_REGISTRO_UNICO
    ,DT_ATUALIZACAO
    ,DT_ENTRADA
    ,NR_INTERNO_CONTA
    ,NR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,DS_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    ,DT_NASCIMENTO
    ,NR_CPF
    ,IE_SEXO
    ,NR_CEP
    ,DS_CIDADE
    ,DS_PESSOA_FISICA
    ,CD_CONVENIO
    ,DS_CONVENIO
    ,CD_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
    ,DS_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
    ,CD_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
    ,DS_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE

WITH db as (
    select 
        TOP 5
        'Smart DayHorc Itabuna' as BASE
        ,3 as CD_MARCA
        ,'DAYHORC' as DS_MARCA
        ,convert(varchar,osm_serie) + convert(varchar,osm_num) AS NS_REGISTRO_UNICO --duvida
        ,smm_dthr_alter as DT_ATUALIZACAO 
        ,osm_dthr as DT_ENTRADA
        ,convert(varchar,osm_serie) + convert(varchar,osm_num) as NR_INTERNO_CONTA --duvida
        ,smm_num as NR_ATENDIMENTO
        ,case ltrim(str_emp.str_cod) 
            when '18' then 7
            when '9' then 7
            when '13' then 7
            when 'SCL' then 7
            when '901' then 7
            when 'IOF' then 7
            when '13' then 8
            when 'DHI' then 9
        end as CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
        ,case ltrim(str_emp.str_cod) 
            when '18' then 'HBA'
            when '9' then 'HBA'
            when '13' then 'HBA'
            when 'SCL' then 'HBA'
            when '901' then 'HBA'
            when 'IOF' then 'HBA'
            when '13' then 'Itaigara'
            when 'DHI' then 'Itabuna'
        end as DS_ESTABELECIMENTO
        ,osm_pac as CD_PESSOA_FISICA
        ,pac_nasc as DT_NASCIMENTO
        ,pac_numcpf as NR_CPF
        ,pac_sexo as IE_SEXO
        ,pac_cep as NR_CEP
        ,case 
            when isnumeric(pac_cid) = 1 then (select cde_nome from cde where cde_cod = pac_cid)
        else pac_cid end as DS_CIDADE
        ,pac_nome as DS_PESSOA_FISICA
        ,cnv_cod as CD_CONVENIO
        ,cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO
        ,psv_exe.psv_cod as CD_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
        ,psv_exe.psv_apel as DS_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
        ,psv_req.psv_cod as CD_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
        ,psv_req.psv_apel as DS_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
        ,isnull(tab_padrao,0) as IE_ORIGEM_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_cod as CD_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smk_rot as DS_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,case ctf_categ 
            when 'C' then 'Consulta'
            when 'E' then 'Exames'
            when 'R' then 'Cirurgia'
            when 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when 'O' then 'Outras'
            when 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when 'G' then 'Gases'
            when 'O' then 'Outros'
        end as DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_qt as QT_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_vlr + isnull(smm_ajuste_vlr,0) as VL_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,case 
            when smm_fat_serie is not null then 2
        else 1 end AS IE_STATUS_ACERTO
        ,case 
            when smm_fat_serie is not null then 'Definitivo'
        else 'Provisório' end as IE_STATUS_CONTA
        ,0 as CD_TUSS 
        ,'' DS_CLASSIF_LIO
        ,smm_sfat
        ,smm_pacote
        ,smm_num_pai
        ,smm_p_osm_serie
        ,smm_p_osm_num
        ,smm_p_smm_num
        ,smm_hsp_num
        ,smm_rci_serie
        ,smm_rci_num
    from 
        osm
        inner join smm on (
            smm_osm_serie = osm_serie
            and smm_osm = osm_num
        )
        inner join str str_osm on (
            str_osm.str_cod = osm_str
        )
        inner join str str_emp on (
            str_osm.str_str_cod = str_emp.str_cod
        )
        inner join pac on (
            pac_reg = osm_pac
        )
        inner join cnv on (
            cnv_cod = osm_cnv
        )
        inner join psv psv_exe on (
            psv_exe.psv_cod = smm_med
        )
        inner join psv psv_req on (
            psv_req.psv_cod = smm_med
        )
        inner join smk on (
            smk_cod = smm_cod
            and smk_tipo = smm_tpcod
        )
        inner join ctf on (
            ctf_cod = smk_ctf
            and ctf_tipo = smk_tipo
        )
        left outer join tab on (
            tab_cod = smm_tab_cod
        )
    where 
        1 = 1
        and osm_dthr >= '2019-02-26'
        and osm_dthr <= '2019-02-26 23:59:000'
)

            when 'DHI' then 'Itabuna'
        end as DS_ESTABELECIMENTO
        ,osm_pac as CD_PESSOA_FISICA
        ,pac_nasc as DT_NASCIMENTO
        ,pac_numcpf as NR_CPF
        ,pac_sexo as IE_SEXO
        ,pac_cep as NR_CEP
        ,case 
            when isnumeric(pac_cid) = 1 then (select cde_nome from cde where cde_cod = pac_cid)
        else pac_cid end as DS_CIDADE
        ,pac_nome as DS_PESSOA_FISICA
        ,cnv_cod as CD_CONVENIO
        ,cnv_nome as DS_CONVENIO
        ,psv_exe.psv_cod as CD_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
        ,psv_exe.psv_apel as DS_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
        ,psv_req.psv_cod as CD_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
        ,psv_req.psv_apel as DS_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
        ,isnull(tab_padrao,0) as IE_ORIGEM_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_cod as CD_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smk_rot as DS_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,case ctf_categ 
            when 'C' then 'Consulta'
            when 'E' then 'Exames'
            when 'R' then 'Cirurgia'
            when 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when 'O' then 'Outras'
            when 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when 'G' then 'Gases'
            when 'O' then 'Outros'
        end as DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_qt as QT_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,smm_vlr + isnull(smm_ajuste_vlr,0) as VL_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,case 
            when smm_fat_serie is not null then 2
        else 1 end AS IE_STATUS_ACERTO
        ,case 
            when smm_fat_serie is not null then 'Definitivo'
        else 'Provisório' end as IE_STATUS_CONTA
        ,0 as CD_TUSS 
        ,'' DS_CLASSIF_LIO
        ,smm_sfat
        ,smm_pacote
        ,smm_num_pai
        ,smm_p_osm_serie
        ,smm_p_osm_num
        ,smm_p_smm_num
        ,smm_hsp_num
        ,smm_rci_serie
        ,smm_rci_num
    from 
        osm
        inner join smm on (
            smm_osm_serie = osm_serie
            and smm_osm = osm_num
        )
        inner join str str_osm on (
            str_osm.str_cod = osm_str
        )
        inner join str str_emp on (
            str_osm.str_str_cod = str_emp.str_cod
        )
        inner join pac on (
            pac_reg = osm_pac
        )
        inner join cnv on (
            cnv_cod = osm_cnv
        )
        inner join psv psv_exe on (
            psv_exe.psv_cod = smm_med
        )
        inner join psv psv_req on (
            psv_req.psv_cod = smm_med
        )
        inner join smk on (
            smk_cod = smm_cod
            and smk_tipo = smm_tpcod
        )
        inner join ctf on (
            ctf_cod = smk_ctf
            and ctf_tipo = smk_tipo
        )
        left outer join tab on (
            tab_cod = smm_tab_cod
        )
    where 
        1 = 1
        and osm_dthr >= '2019-02-26'
        and osm_dthr <= '2019-02-26 23:59:000'
)

select
    BASE 
    ,CD_MARCA
    ,DS_MARCA
    ,NS_REGISTRO_UNICO
    ,DT_ATUALIZACAO
    ,DT_ENTRADA
    ,NR_INTERNO_CONTA
    ,NR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,DS_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    ,DT_NASCIMENTO
    ,NR_CPF
    ,IE_SEXO
    ,NR_CEP
    ,DS_CIDADE
    ,DS_PESSOA_FISICA
    ,CD_CONVENIO
    ,DS_CONVENIO
    ,CD_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
    ,DS_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
    ,CD_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
    ,DS_MEDICO_REQUISITANTE
    ,IE_ORIGEM_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,case 
        when smm_num_pai is null then DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    else (select    
            CD_PROCEDIMENTO 
        from 
            db tmp 
        where 
            tmp.NR_INTERNO_CONTA = db.NR_INTERNO_CONTA 
            and db.smm_num_pai = tmp.NR_ATENDIMENTO
        ) end as CD_PROCEDIMENTO_PRINCIPAL
    ,case 
        when smm_num_pai is null then DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    else (select 
            DS_PROCEDIMENTO 
        from 
            db tmp 
        where 
            tmp.NR_INTERNO_CONTA = db.NR_INTERNO_CONTA 
            and db.smm_num_pai = tmp.NR_ATENDIMENTO
        ) end as DS_PROCEDIMENTO_PRINCIPAL
    ,QT_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,(select 
        sum(VL_PROCEDIMENTO) 
    from 
        db tmp 
    where 
        tmp.NR_INTERNO_CONTA = db.NR_INTERNO_CONTA 
        and (smm_pacote IS NULL OR ( smm_pacote = 'C' )) 
        and smm_sfat not in ('C')
    ) AS VL_CONTA 
    ,VL_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,IE_STATUS_ACERTO
    ,IE_STATUS_CONTA
    ,CD_TUSS
    ,DS_CLASSIF_LIO
    -- ,smm_rci_serie
    -- ,smm_rci_num
    -- ,smm_p_osm_serie
    -- ,smm_p_osm_num
from 
    db
where
    1 = 1
    and VL_PROCEDIMENTO <> 0
    and (smm_pacote IS NULL OR ( smm_pacote = 'C' )) 
    and smm_sfat not in ('C')

source.oracleReaderQuery:
select

'Tasy Sadalla' as BASE,
--x.nr_seq_proc_pacote,
7 as cd_marca,
'Hospital de Olhos Sadalla Amin Ghanem' as marca,
17 as cd_estabelecimento,
c.nr_atendimento,
'7'||'17'||c.nr_atendimento as nr_registro_unico,
x.dt_atualizacao,
at.dt_entrada,
c.nr_interno_conta,
null as ds_estabelecimento,
pf.cd_pessoa_fisica,

pf.dt_nascimento,
pf.nr_cpf,
pf.ie_sexo,
obter_compl_pf(pf.cd_pessoa_fisica,1,'CEP') as nr_cep,
obter_compl_pf(pf.cd_pessoa_fisica,1,'CI') as ds_cidade,
--pf.cd_pessoa_fisica as cd_pessoa_fisica,
obter_nome_pf(at.cd_pessoa_fisica) as ds_pessoa_fisica,
c.cd_convenio_parametro as cd_convenio,
obter_nome_convenio(c.cd_convenio_parametro) as ds_convenio,
x.cd_medico_executor,
obter_nome_pf(x.cd_medico_executor) as ds_medico_executor,
x.cd_medico_req as cd_medico_requisitante,
obter_nome_pf(x.cd_medico_req) as ds_medico_requisitante,
x.ie_origem_proced,
x.cd_procedimento,
x.ds_procedimento as ds_procedimento,
x.classif as ds_classificacao,

(select r.ds_grupo_receita from grupo_receita r where r.nr_sequencia = x.nr_seq_grupo_rec) as ds_classif_procedimento,

case
when (select r.nr_sequencia from grupo_receita r where r.nr_sequencia = x.nr_seq_grupo_rec) = 12 then x.cd_procedimento
else

(select z.cd_procedimento as valor 
 from procedimento_paciente z 
 where z.nr_atendimento = c.nr_atendimento 
 and z.nr_interno_conta = c.nr_interno_conta 
 --and z.vl_medico = (select max(w.vl_medico) 
 and z.nr_sequencia = (select min(w.nr_sequencia)
                          from procedimento_paciente w 
                          where w.nr_atendimento = z.nr_atendimento 
                          and w.nr_interno_conta = z.nr_interno_conta
                          and w.cd_motivo_exc_conta is null
                          ) 
 group by z.cd_procedimento) end cd_proced_principal,

case
when (select r.nr_sequencia from grupo_receita r where r.nr_sequencia = x.nr_seq_grupo_rec) = 12 then obter_desc_procedimento(x.cd_procedimento, x.ie_origem_proced)
else

obter_desc_procedimento(

(select z.cd_procedimento as valor 
   from procedimento_paciente z 
   where z.nr_atendimento = c.nr_atendimento 
   and z.nr_interno_conta = c.nr_interno_conta 
   --and z.vl_medico = (select max(w.vl_medico) 
    and z.nr_sequencia = (select min(w.nr_sequencia)
                            from procedimento_paciente w 
                            where w.nr_atendimento = z.nr_atendimento 
                            and w.nr_interno_conta = z.nr_interno_conta
                            and w.cd_motivo_exc_conta is null
                            ) 
                            group by z.cd_procedimento),

(select min(z.ie_origem_proced) as ie_origem_proced 
   from procedimento_paciente z 
   where z.nr_atendimento = c.nr_atendimento 
   and z.nr_interno_conta = c.nr_interno_conta 
   --and z.vl_medico = (select max(w.vl_medico) 
    and z.nr_sequencia = (select min(w.nr_sequencia)
                         from procedimento_paciente w 
                         where w.nr_atendimento = z.nr_atendimento 
                         and w.nr_interno_conta = z.nr_interno_conta
                         and w.cd_motivo_exc_conta is null
                         ) 
 group by z.ie_origem_proced)

)end ds_proced_principal,

x.qt_procedimento,
c.vl_conta,
x.vl_procedimento,
c.ie_status_acerto,
decode(c.ie_status_acerto, 1,'Provisorio' , 2 ,'Definitivo') as status_conta,
x.tuss as cd_tuss,
(select x.ds_estrutura from  mat_estrutura x, mat_estrutura_cadastro y where x.nr_sequencia = y.nr_seq_estrutura and y.cd_material = x.cd_procedimento) as ds_classif_lio
from atendimento_paciente at,
conta_paciente c,
pessoa_fisica pf,

(select p.nr_interno_conta, 
p.cd_procedimento, 
obter_desc_procedimento(p.cd_procedimento, p.ie_origem_proced) as ds_procedimento, 
obter_valor_dominio(19,pr.ie_classificacao) as classif,
p.cd_medico_executor,
p.cd_medico_req,
p.ie_origem_proced,
p.qt_procedimento,
p.vl_procedimento,
p.vl_medico,
p.nr_sequencia,
p.cd_edicao_amb,
p.cd_convenio,
p.nr_atendimento,
p.cd_motivo_exc_conta,
p.nr_seq_proc_crit_repasse,
obter_codigo_tuss(p.nr_seq_proc_interno) as tuss,
p.dt_atualizacao,
pr.nr_seq_grupo_rec
from procedimento_paciente p,
     procedimento pr
where p.cd_procedimento = pr.cd_procedimento
and p.ie_origem_proced = pr.ie_origem_proced

union all
select mp.nr_interno_conta, 
mp.cd_material as cd_procedimento, 
m.ds_material as ds_procedimento,
obter_dados_material(m.cd_material,'GRU') as classif,
obter_medico_resp_atend(mp.nr_atendimento,'C') as cd_medico_executor,
obter_medico_resp_atend(mp.nr_atendimento,'C') as cd_medico_req,
0 as ie_origem_proced,
mp.qt_material,
mp.vl_material,
0 vl_medico,
mp.nr_sequencia,
'0' as cd_edicao_amb,
mp.cd_convenio,
mp.nr_atendimento,
mp.cd_motivo_exc_conta,
0 nr_seq_proc_crit_repasse,
0 tuss,
mp.dt_atualizacao,
0 nr_seq_grupo_rec
from material_atend_paciente mp,
     material m
where mp.cd_material = m.cd_material) x

where at.nr_atendimento = c.nr_atendimento
and c.nr_interno_conta = x.nr_interno_conta
and at.cd_pessoa_fisica = pf.cd_pessoa_fisica
and c.ie_cancelamento is null
and x.cd_motivo_exc_conta is null
and c.cd_estabelecimento = 1
and at.dt_entrada BETWEEN sysdate -2 and sysdate
and c.vl_conta > 0
and ROWNUM <=5
group by 
c.nr_atendimento,
at.dt_entrada,
c.nr_interno_conta,
c.cd_estabelecimento,
at.cd_pessoa_fisica,
c.cd_convenio_parametro,
c.vl_conta,
x.nr_sequencia,
x.vl_medico,
x.vl_procedimento,
x.ie_origem_proced,
x.cd_procedimento,
x.ds_procedimento,
x.qt_procedimento,
x.cd_edicao_amb,
x.cd_medico_executor,
c.ie_status_acerto,
x.nr_atendimento,
x.cd_convenio,
at.ie_tipo_atendimento,
x.nr_interno_conta,
pf.dt_nascimento,
pf.nr_cpf,
x.cd_medico_req,
pf.ie_sexo,
pf.cd_pessoa_fisica,
x.classif,
x.tuss,
x.nr_seq_grupo_rec,
x.dt_atualizacao,
at.nr_atendimento

order by 5,3 desc

source.sqlReaderQuery:
with ctf as(

    SELECT
        x.ctf_cod    
        ,x.ctf_tipo
        ,case
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'C' then 'Consultas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'R' then 'Cirurgias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'E' then 'Exames'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'D' then 'Diárias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'G' then 'Gases'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'O' then 'Outros'
          end DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO  
    from dbo.ctf x
) 


,prod as(
SELECT
    itm.smm_num_pai
    ,itm.smm_num
    ,itm.smm_dthr_exec                                                                      as DT_LANCAMENTO
    ,a.osm_num                                                                              as NR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,a.osm_dthr                                                                             as DT_ENTRADA
    ,a.osm_cnv                                                                              as CD_CONVENIO
    ,pac.pac_reg                                                                            as CD_PESSOA_FISICA            
    ,pac.pac_nome                                                                           AS NM_PACIENTE
    -- ,cast(a.osm_serie as varchar(15)) + '.' + cast(a.osm_num as varchar(5))                 as NR_INTERNO_CONTA   
    ,a.osm_serie                                                                            as NR_INTERNO_CONTA   
    ,a.osm_atend                                                                            as CD_TIPO_ATEND
    ,A.osm_proc                                                                             AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    -- ,a.osm_mcnv                                                                             as cd_carterinha_pac
    -- ,a.osm_cid_cod                                                                          as cd_cid
    -- ,a.osm_pln_cod                                                                          as cd_plano_convenio
    ,a.osm_str                                                                              as CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,itm.smm_str                                                                            as CD_SETOR_EXECUTANTE
    ,a.osm_mreq                                                                             as CD_MEDICO_SOL
    ,itm.smm_med                                                                            as CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    -- ,itm.smm_cod                                                                            as cd_item_smart
    -- ,itm.smm_pre_ccv                                                                        as cd_item_conv
    ,CAST(CAST(a.osm_serie as varchar(10)) 
        + cast(a.osm_num as varchar(50)) 
        + CAST(itm.smm_num AS VARCHAR(50))
        + CAST(A.OSM_PAC AS VARCHAR(50))
         AS DECIMAL)                                                                        as NR_SEQUENCIA
    ,pi.smk_cod                                                                             as NR_PROC_INTERNO       
    ,pi.smk_amb                                                                             as CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,pi.smk_rot                                                                             as DS_PROC_INTERNO 
    ,pi.smk_nome                                                                            as DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,pi.smk_ctf
    ,pi.smk_tipo
    ,itm.smm_motivo_cancela                                                                 as MOTIVO_CANCEL_ITEM
    ,itm.smm_canc_mot_cod                                                                   as CD_MOTIVO_CANCEL_ITEM
    ,itm.smm_rpi_serie                                                                      as NR_SERIE_REPASSE
    ,itm.smm_rpi_num                                                                        as NR_REPASSE
    ,itm.smm_pacote                                                                         as IE_PACOTE
    -- ,itm.smm_hon_seq
    ,itm.smm_fat_serie
    ,itm.smm_fat
    ,itm.smm_tipo_fatura
    ,itm.smm_dthr_alter                                                                     as dt_atualizacao                                                                      
    ,itm.smm_qt                                                                             as QTD
    ,itm.smm_vlr                                                                            AS VL_ITEM
    ,isnull(itm.smm_ajuste_vlr,0)                                                           as VL_ITEM_AJUSTE
    ,ROUND(ISNULL(round(
                    (hon.hon_vl1 * itm.smm_qt) 
                  + (itm.smm_vlr + isnull(itm.smm_ajuste_vlr,0)) 
                  * hon.hon_pc1 / 100,3),0
                  ),2)                                                                      AS VL_HM
    ,ROUND(ISNULL(mte.mte_perc_desconto,0),2)                                               as PERC_DESCONTO


FROM dbo.osm a                  (NOLOCK)
inner join dbo.pac pac          (NOLOCK) on pac.pac_reg = a.osm_pac
inner join dbo.smm itm          (NOLOCK) on itm.smm_osm_serie = a.osm_serie and itm.smm_osm = a.osm_num
inner join dbo.smk pi           (NOLOCK) on pi.smk_cod = itm.smm_cod and pi.smK_tipo = itm.smm_tpcod
-- left join dbo.hon  hon          (NOLOCK) on hon.hon_seq = itm.smm_hon_seq
LEFT join dbo.hon  hon          (NOLOCK) on hon.hon_seq = itm.smm_hon_seq

OUTER APPLY (
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN (MTE.mte_valor <> 0)
                THEN MTE.mte_desconto / MTE.mte_valor
            ELSE 0
        END AS mte_perc_desconto
    FROM MTE MTE (NOLOCK)
    LEFT JOIN NFS NFS (NOLOCK)  ON MTE.MTE_NFS_NUMERO = NFS.nfs_numero AND MTE.MTE_NFS_SERIE = NFS.nfs_serie AND MTE.MTE_NFS_TIPO = NFS.NFS_TIPO
    WHERE MTE.MTE_SERIE = ITM.SMM_MTE_SERIE AND MTE.MTE_SEQ = ITM.SMM_MTE_SEQ
)MTE


WHERE 
     itm.smm_vlr <> 0
    and (itm.smm_pacote IS NULL OR ( itm.smm_pacote = 'C' )) 
    and itm.smm_exec <> 'C'
    and itm.smm_sfat <> 'C'
    and itm.smm_str like '%'
    and pi.smk_ctf LIKE '%'
    AND (itm.smm_sfat IN ('a', 'f', '?', 'p', '?'))
    and substring(cast(CAST(a.osm_dthr as date) as varchar(10)),1,7) = SUBSTRING(cast(CAST(getdate() AS DATE) as varchar(10)),1,7)
    -- AND CAST(a.osm_dthr AS DATE) BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
    -- AND A.osm_serie = '121' AND A.osm_num = '21460'
)

select 

    90                                                  AS ID_SYSTEM
    ,g.gcc_str_cod                                      AS CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,G.gcc_descr                                        AS DS_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,a.DT_ENTRADA
    ,A.DT_LANCAMENTO
    ,A.NR_ATENDIMENTO           
    ,CAST(A.nr_interno_conta AS VARCHAR(10))
        + CAST(A.NR_ATENDIMENTO AS VARCHAR(50))         AS NR_INTERNO_CONTA
    ,emp.emp_cgc                                        as CGC_CONVENIO
    ,A.cd_convenio                                      AS CD_CONVENIO
    ,conv.cnv_nome                                      as DS_CONVENIO
    ,a.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    ,A.NM_PACIENTE                                      AS NM_PACIENTE
    ,A.CD_MEDICO_SOL
    ,PSOL.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_SOLICITANTE
    ,A.CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_RESPONSAVEL
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_ATENDIMENTO
    ,B.str_cod                                          as CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,b.str_nome                                         as DS_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,A.NR_SEQUENCIA
    -- ,A.smm_num_pai
    -- ,smk.smk_rot                                        as DS_PROC_PRINC
    ,A.NR_PROC_INTERNO
    ,A.DS_PROC_INTERNO
    ,A.CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,A.DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,c.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,A.CD_PROCEDENCIA
    ,A.QTD                                              AS QTD_ITEM
    ,A.VL_ITEM                                          AS VL_ITEM_ORIGINAL                 
    ,A.VL_ITEM + A.VL_ITEM_AJUSTE                       AS VL_ITEM
    ,a.VL_HM
    ,a.PERC_DESCONTO
    ,a.DT_ATUALIZACAO
from prod a
inner join dbo.str b                (nolock)        on b.str_cod = a.CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO  
left join dbo.gcc g                (NOLOCK)        on g.gcc_str_cod = b.str_str_cod
inner join dbo.cnv conv             (NOLOCK)        on conv.cnv_cod = a.cd_convenio
inner join dbo.emp                  (nolock)        on emp_cod = conv.cnv_emp_cod  
inner join ctf     c                                on ctf_cod = a.smk_ctf  and ctf_tipo = a.smk_tipo
INNER JOIN psv     PEXC             (NOLOCK)        ON PEXC.psv_cod = A.CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
INNER JOIN psv     PSOL             (NOLOCK)        ON PSOL.psv_cod = A.CD_MEDICO_SOL


WHERE C.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO IS NOT NULL

with ctf as(

    SELECT
        x.ctf_cod    
        ,x.ctf_tipo

,prod as(
SELECT
    itm.smm_num_pai

    ,a.osm_num                                                                              as NR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,a.osm_dthr                                                                             as DT_ENTRADA
    ,a.osm_cnv                                                                              as CD_CONVENIO
    ,pac.pac_reg                                                                            as CD_PESSOA_FISICA

    -- ,cast(a.osm_serie as varchar(15)) + '.' + cast(a.osm_num as varchar(5))                 as NR_INTERNO_CONTA

    -- ,a.osm_pln_cod                                                                          as cd_plano_convenio

    ,itm.smm_str                                                                            as CD_SETOR_EXECUTANTE
    ,a.osm_mreq                                                                             as CD_MEDICO_SOL
    ,itm.smm_med                                                                            as CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    -- ,itm.smm_cod                                                                            as cd_item_smart
    -- ,itm.smm_pre_ccv                                                                        as cd_item_conv
    ,CAST(CAST(a.osm_serie as varchar(10))

        + CAST(A.OSM_PAC AS VARCHAR(50))
         AS DECIMAL)                                                                        as NR_SEQUENCIA
    ,pi.smk_cod                                                                             as NR_PROC_INTERNO       
    ,pi.smk_amb                                                                             as CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,pi.smk_rot                                                                             as DS_PROC_INTERNO 
    ,pi.smk_nome                                                                            as DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,pi.smk_ctf
    ,pi.smk_tipo
    ,itm.smm_motivo_cancela                                                                 as MOTIVO_CANCEL_ITEM
    ,itm.smm_canc_mot_cod                                                                   as CD_MOTIVO_CANCEL_ITEM
    ,itm.smm_rpi_serie                                                                      as NR_SERIE_REPASSE
    ,itm.smm_rpi_num                                                                        as NR_REPASSE
    ,itm.smm_pacote                                                                         as IE_PACOTE
    -- ,itm.smm_hon_seq
    ,itm.smm_fat_serie
    ,itm.smm_fat
    ,itm.smm_tipo_fatura
    ,itm.smm_dthr_alter                                                                     as dt_atualizacao                                                                      
    ,itm.smm_qt                                                                             as QTD
    ,itm.smm_vlr                                                                            AS VL_ITEM

inner join dbo.smm itm          (NOLOCK) on itm.smm_osm_serie = a.osm_serie and itm.smm_osm = a.osm_num
inner join dbo.smk pi           (NOLOCK) on pi.smk_cod = itm.smm_cod and pi.smK_tipo = itm.smm_tpcod
-- left join dbo.hon  hon          (NOLOCK) on hon.hon_seq = itm.smm_hon_seq
LEFT join dbo.hon  hon          (NOLOCK) on hon.hon_seq = itm.smm_hon_seq

OUTER APPLY (
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN (MTE.mte_valor <> 0)
                THEN MTE.mte_desconto / MTE.mte_valor
            ELSE 0
        END AS mte_perc_desconto
    FROM MTE MTE (NOLOCK)
    LEFT JOIN NFS NFS (NOLOCK)  ON MTE.MTE_NFS_NUMERO = NFS.nfs_numero AND MTE.MTE_NFS_SERIE = NFS.nfs_serie AND MTE.MTE_NFS_TIPO = NFS.NFS_TIPO

)

select 

    90                                                  AS ID_SYSTEM
    ,g.gcc_str_cod                                      AS CD_ESTABELECIMENTO

    ,a.DT_ENTRADA
    ,A.DT_LANCAMENTO
    ,A.NR_ATENDIMENTO           
    ,CAST(A.nr_interno_conta AS VARCHAR(10))
        + CAST(A.NR_ATENDIMENTO AS VARCHAR(50))         AS NR_INTERNO_CONTA
    ,emp.emp_cgc                                        as CGC_CONVENIO
    ,A.cd_convenio                                      AS CD_CONVENIO
    ,conv.cnv_nome                                      as DS_CONVENIO
    ,a.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    ,A.NM_PACIENTE                                      AS NM_PACIENTE
    ,A.CD_MEDICO_SOL
    ,PSOL.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_SOLICITANTE
    ,A.CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_RESPONSAVEL

    ,A.QTD                                              AS QTD_ITEM

    ,a.PERC_DESCONTO
    ,a.DT_ATUALIZACAO

DECLARE @PERIODO AS VARCHAR(7)

SELECT
    @PERIODO = SUBSTRING(cast(CAST(getdate()-1 AS DATE) as varchar(10)),1,7)

with ctf as(

    SELECT
        x.ctf_cod    
        ,x.ctf_tipo
        ,case
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'C' then 'Consultas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'R' then 'Cirurgias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'E' then 'Exames'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'D' then 'Diárias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'G' then 'Gases'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'O' then 'Outros'
          end DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO  
    from dbo.ctf x
) 


,prod as(
SELECT
    itm.smm_num_pai
    ,itm.smm_num
    ,itm.smm_dthr_exec                                                                      as DT_LANCAMENTO
    ,a.osm_num                                                                              as NR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,a.osm_dthr                                                                             as DT_ENTRADA
    ,a.osm_cnv                                                                              as CD_CONVENIO
    ,pac.pac_reg                                                                            as CD_PESSOA_FISICA            
    ,pac.pac_nome                                                                           AS NM_PACIENTE
    -- ,cast(a.osm_serie as varchar(15)) + '.' + cast(a.osm_num as varchar(5))                 as NR_INTERNO_CONTA   
    ,a.osm_serie                                                                            as NR_INTERNO_CONTA   
    ,a.osm_atend                                                                            as CD_TIPO_ATEND
    ,A.osm_proc                                                                             AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    -- ,a.osm_mcnv                                                                             as cd_carterinha_pac
    -- ,a.osm_cid_cod                                                                          as cd_cid
    -- ,a.osm_pln_cod                                                                          as cd_plano_convenio
    ,a.osm_str                                                                              as CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,itm.smm_str                                                                            as CD_SETOR_EXECUTANTE
    ,a.osm_mreq                                                                             as CD_MEDICO_SOL
    ,itm.smm_med                                                                            as CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    -- ,itm.smm_cod                                                                            as cd_item_smart
    -- ,itm.smm_pre_ccv                                                                        as cd_item_conv
    ,CAST(CAST(a.osm_serie as varchar(10)) 
        + cast(a.osm_num as varchar(50)) 
        + CAST(itm.smm_num AS VARCHAR(50))
        + CAST(A.OSM_PAC AS VARCHAR(50))
         AS DECIMAL)                                                                        as NR_SEQUENCIA
    ,pi.smk_cod                                                                             as NR_PROC_INTERNO       
    ,pi.smk_amb                                                                             as CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,pi.smk_rot                                                                             as DS_PROC_INTERNO 
    ,pi.smk_nome                                                                            as DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,pi.smk_ctf
    ,pi.smk_tipo
    ,itm.smm_motivo_cancela                                                                 as MOTIVO_CANCEL_ITEM
    ,itm.smm_canc_mot_cod                                                                   as CD_MOTIVO_CANCEL_ITEM
    ,itm.smm_rpi_serie                                                                      as NR_SERIE_REPASSE
    ,itm.smm_rpi_num                                                                        as NR_REPASSE
    ,itm.smm_pacote                                                                         as IE_PACOTE
    -- ,itm.smm_hon_seq
    ,itm.smm_fat_serie
    ,itm.smm_fat
    ,itm.smm_tipo_fatura
    ,itm.smm_dthr_alter                                                                     as dt_atualizacao                                                                      
    ,itm.smm_qt                                                                             as QTD
    ,itm.smm_vlr                                                                            AS VL_ITEM
    ,isnull(itm.smm_ajuste_vlr,0)                                                           as VL_ITEM_AJUSTE
    ,ROUND(ISNULL(round(
                    (hon.hon_vl1 * itm.smm_qt) 
                  + (itm.smm_vlr + isnull(itm.smm_ajuste_vlr,0)) 
                  * hon.hon_pc1 / 100,3),0
                  ),2)                                                                      AS VL_HM
    ,ROUND(ISNULL(mte.mte_perc_desconto,0),2)                                               as PERC_DESCONTO


FROM dbo.osm a                  (NOLOCK)
inner join dbo.pac pac          (NOLOCK) on pac.pac_reg = a.osm_pac
inner join dbo.smm itm          (NOLOCK) on itm.smm_osm_serie = a.osm_serie and itm.smm_osm = a.osm_num
inner join dbo.smk pi           (NOLOCK) on pi.smk_cod = itm.smm_cod and pi.smK_tipo = itm.smm_tpcod
-- left join dbo.hon  hon          (NOLOCK) on hon.hon_seq = itm.smm_hon_seq
LEFT join dbo.hon  hon          (NOLOCK) on hon.hon_seq = itm.smm_hon_seq

OUTER APPLY (
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN (MTE.mte_valor <> 0)
                THEN MTE.mte_desconto / MTE.mte_valor
            ELSE 0
        END AS mte_perc_desconto
    FROM MTE MTE (NOLOCK)
    LEFT JOIN NFS NFS (NOLOCK)  ON MTE.MTE_NFS_NUMERO = NFS.nfs_numero AND MTE.MTE_NFS_SERIE = NFS.nfs_serie AND MTE.MTE_NFS_TIPO = NFS.NFS_TIPO
    WHERE MTE.MTE_SERIE = ITM.SMM_MTE_SERIE AND MTE.MTE_SEQ = ITM.SMM_MTE_SEQ
)MTE


WHERE 
     itm.smm_vlr <> 0
    and (itm.smm_pacote IS NULL OR ( itm.smm_pacote = 'C' )) 
    and itm.smm_exec <> 'C'
    and itm.smm_sfat <> 'C'

    and pi.smk_ctf LIKE '%'
    AND (itm.smm_sfat IN ('a', 'f', '?', 'p', '?'))

    ,A.VL_ITEM + A.VL_ITEM_AJUSTE                       AS VL_ITEM
    ,a.VL_HM
    ,a.PERC_DESCONTO
    ,a.DT_ATUALIZACAO
from prod a

         AS DECIMAL)                                                                        as NR_SEQUENCIA
    ,pi.smk_cod                                                                             as NR_PROC_INTERNO       
    ,pi.smk_amb                                                                             as CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,pi.smk_rot                                                                             as DS_PROC_INTERNO 
    ,pi.smk_nome                                                                            as DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,pi.smk_ctf
    ,pi.smk_tipo
    ,itm.smm_motivo_cancela                                                                 as MOTIVO_CANCEL_ITEM
    ,itm.smm_canc_mot_cod                                                                   as CD_MOTIVO_CANCEL_ITEM
    ,itm.smm_rpi_serie                                                                      as NR_SERIE_REPASSE
    ,itm.smm_rpi_num                                                                        as NR_REPASSE
    ,itm.smm_pacote                                                                         as IE_PACOTE
    -- ,itm.smm_hon_seq
    ,itm.smm_fat_serie
    ,itm.smm_fat
    ,itm.smm_tipo_fatura
    ,itm.smm_dthr_alter                                                                     as dt_atualizacao                                                                      
    ,itm.smm_qt                                                                             as QTD
    ,itm.smm_vlr                                                                            AS VL_ITEM
    ,isnull(itm.smm_ajuste_vlr,0)                                                           as VL_ITEM_AJUSTE
    ,ROUND(ISNULL(round(
                    (hon.hon_vl1 * itm.smm_qt) 
                  + (itm.smm_vlr + isnull(itm.smm_ajuste_vlr,0)) 
                  * hon.hon_pc1 / 100,3),0
                  ),2)                                                                      AS VL_HM
    ,ROUND(ISNULL(mte.mte_perc_desconto,0),2)                                               as PERC_DESCONTO


FROM dbo.osm a                  (NOLOCK)
inner join dbo.pac pac          (NOLOCK) on pac.pac_reg = a.osm_pac
inner join dbo.smm itm          (NOLOCK) on itm.smm_osm_serie = a.osm_serie and itm.smm_osm = a.osm_num
inner join dbo.smk pi           (NOLOCK) on pi.smk_cod = itm.smm_cod and pi.smK_tipo = itm.smm_tpcod
-- left join dbo.hon  hon          (NOLOCK) on hon.hon_seq = itm.smm_hon_seq
LEFT join dbo.hon  hon          (NOLOCK) on hon.hon_seq = itm.smm_hon_seq

OUTER APPLY (
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN (MTE.mte_valor <> 0)
                THEN MTE.mte_desconto / MTE.mte_valor
            ELSE 0
        END AS mte_perc_desconto
    FROM MTE MTE (NOLOCK)
    LEFT JOIN NFS NFS (NOLOCK)  ON MTE.MTE_NFS_NUMERO = NFS.nfs_numero AND MTE.MTE_NFS_SERIE = NFS.nfs_serie AND MTE.MTE_NFS_TIPO = NFS.NFS_TIPO
    WHERE MTE.MTE_SERIE = ITM.SMM_MTE_SERIE AND MTE.MTE_SEQ = ITM.SMM_MTE_SEQ
)MTE


WHERE 
     itm.smm_vlr <> 0
    and (itm.smm_pacote IS NULL OR ( itm.smm_pacote = 'C' )) 
    and itm.smm_exec <> 'C'
    and itm.smm_sfat <> 'C'
    and itm.smm_str like '%'
    and pi.smk_ctf LIKE '%'
    AND (itm.smm_sfat IN ('a', 'f', '?', 'p', '?'))
    and substring(cast(CAST(a.osm_dthr as date) as varchar(10)),1,7) = @PERIODO
    -- AND CAST(a.osm_dthr AS DATE) BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
    -- AND A.osm_serie = '121' AND A.osm_num = '21460'
)

select 

    90                                                  AS ID_SYSTEM
    ,g.gcc_str_cod                                      AS CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,G.gcc_descr                                        AS DS_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,a.DT_ENTRADA
    ,A.DT_LANCAMENTO
    ,A.NR_ATENDIMENTO           
    ,CAST(A.nr_interno_conta AS VARCHAR(10))
        + CAST(A.NR_ATENDIMENTO AS VARCHAR(50))         AS NR_INTERNO_CONTA
    ,emp.emp_cgc                                        as CGC_CONVENIO
    ,A.cd_convenio                                      AS CD_CONVENIO
    ,conv.cnv_nome                                      as DS_CONVENIO
    ,a.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    ,A.NM_PACIENTE                                      AS NM_PACIENTE
    ,A.CD_MEDICO_SOL
    ,PSOL.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_SOLICITANTE
    ,A.CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_RESPONSAVEL
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_ATENDIMENTO
    ,B.str_cod                                          as CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,b.str_nome                                         as DS_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,A.NR_SEQUENCIA
    -- ,A.smm_num_pai
    -- ,smk.smk_rot                                        as DS_PROC_PRINC
    ,A.NR_PROC_INTERNO
    ,A.DS_PROC_INTERNO
    ,A.CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,A.DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,c.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,A.CD_PROCEDENCIA
    ,A.QTD                                              AS QTD_ITEM
    ,A.VL_ITEM                                          AS VL_ITEM_ORIGINAL                 
    ,A.VL_ITEM + A.VL_ITEM_AJUSTE                       AS VL_ITEM
    ,a.VL_HM
    ,a.PERC_DESCONTO
    ,a.DT_ATUALIZACAO
from prod a
inner join dbo.str b                (nolock)        on b.str_cod = a.CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO  
left join dbo.gcc g                (NOLOCK)        on g.gcc_str_cod = b.str_str_cod
inner join dbo.cnv conv             (NOLOCK)        on conv.cnv_cod = a.cd_convenio
inner join dbo.emp                  (nolock)        on emp_cod = conv.cnv_emp_cod  
inner join ctf     c                                on ctf_cod = a.smk_ctf  and ctf_tipo = a.smk_tipo
INNER JOIN psv     PEXC             (NOLOCK)        ON PEXC.psv_cod = A.CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
INNER JOIN psv     PSOL             (NOLOCK)        ON PSOL.psv_cod = A.CD_MEDICO_SOL


WHERE C.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO IS NOT NULL

DECLARE @PERIODO AS VARCHAR(7)

SELECT
    @PERIODO = SUBSTRING(cast(CAST(getdate()-1 AS DATE) as varchar(10)),1,7)

with ctf as(

    SELECT
        x.ctf_cod    
        ,x.ctf_tipo
        ,case
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'C' then 'Consultas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'R' then 'Cirurgias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'E' then 'Exames'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'D' then 'Diárias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'G' then 'Gases'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'O' then 'Outros'
          end DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO  
    from dbo.ctf x
) 


,prod as(
SELECT
    itm.smm_num_pai
    ,itm.smm_num
    ,itm.smm_dthr_exec                                                                      as DT_LANCAMENTO
    ,a.osm_num                                                                              as NR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,a.osm_dthr                                                                             as DT_ENTRADA
    ,a.osm_cnv                                                                              as CD_CONVENIO
    ,pac.pac_reg                                                                            as CD_PESSOA_FISICA            
    ,pac.pac_nome                                                                           AS NM_PACIENTE
    -- ,cast(a.osm_serie as varchar(15)) + '.' + cast(a.osm_num as varchar(5))                 as NR_INTERNO_CONTA   
    ,a.osm_serie                                                                            as NR_INTERNO_CONTA   
    ,a.osm_atend                                                                            as CD_TIPO_ATEND
    ,A.osm_proc                                                                             AS CD_PROCEDENCIA
    -- ,a.osm_mcnv                                                                             as cd_carterinha_pac
    -- ,a.osm_cid_cod                                                                          as cd_cid
    -- ,a.osm_pln_cod                                                                          as cd_plano_convenio
    ,a.osm_str                                                                              as CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,itm.smm_str                                                                            as CD_SETOR_EXECUTANTE
    ,a.osm_mreq                                                                             as CD_MEDICO_SOL
    ,itm.smm_med                                                                            as CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    -- ,itm.smm_cod                                                                            as cd_item_smart
    -- ,itm.smm_pre_ccv                                                                        as cd_item_conv
    ,CAST(CAST(a.osm_serie as varchar(10)) 
        + cast(a.osm_num as varchar(50)) 
        + CAST(itm.smm_num AS VARCHAR(50))
        + CAST(A.OSM_PAC AS VARCHAR(50))
         AS DECIMAL)                                                                        as NR_SEQUENCIA
    ,pi.smk_cod                                                                             as NR_PROC_INTERNO       
    ,pi.smk_amb                                                                             as CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,pi.smk_rot                                                                             as DS_PROC_INTERNO 
    ,pi.smk_nome                                                                            as DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,pi.smk_ctf
    ,pi.smk_tipo
    ,itm.smm_motivo_cancela                                                                 as MOTIVO_CANCEL_ITEM
    ,itm.smm_canc_mot_cod                                                                   as CD_MOTIVO_CANCEL_ITEM
    ,itm.smm_rpi_serie                                                                      as NR_SERIE_REPASSE
    ,itm.smm_rpi_num                                                                        as NR_REPASSE
    ,itm.smm_pacote                                                                         as IE_PACOTE
    -- ,itm.smm_hon_seq
    ,itm.smm_fat_serie
    ,itm.smm_fat
    ,itm.smm_tipo_fatura
    ,itm.smm_dthr_alter                                                                     as dt_atualizacao                                                                      
    ,itm.smm_qt                                                                             as QTD
    ,itm.smm_vlr                                                                            AS VL_ITEM
    ,isnull(itm.smm_ajuste_vlr,0)                                                           as VL_ITEM_AJUSTE
    ,ROUND(ISNULL(round(
                    (hon.hon_vl1 * itm.smm_qt) 
                  + (itm.smm_vlr + isnull(itm.smm_ajuste_vlr,0)) 
                  * hon.hon_pc1 / 100,3),0
                  ),2)                                                                      AS VL_HM
    ,ROUND(ISNULL(mte.mte_perc_desconto,0),2)                                               as PERC_DESCONTO


FROM dbo.osm a                  (NOLOCK)
inner join dbo.pac pac          (NOLOCK) on pac.pac_reg = a.osm_pac
inner join dbo.smm itm          (NOLOCK) on itm.smm_osm_serie = a.osm_serie and itm.smm_osm = a.osm_num
inner join dbo.smk pi           (NOLOCK) on pi.smk_cod = itm.smm_cod and pi.smK_tipo = itm.smm_tpcod
-- left join dbo.hon  hon          (NOLOCK) on hon.hon_seq = itm.smm_hon_seq
LEFT join dbo.hon  hon          (NOLOCK) on hon.hon_seq = itm.smm_hon_seq

OUTER APPLY (
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN (MTE.mte_valor <> 0)
                THEN MTE.mte_desconto / MTE.mte_valor
            ELSE 0
        END AS mte_perc_desconto
    FROM MTE MTE (NOLOCK)
    LEFT JOIN NFS NFS (NOLOCK)  ON MTE.MTE_NFS_NUMERO = NFS.nfs_numero AND MTE.MTE_NFS_SERIE = NFS.nfs_serie AND MTE.MTE_NFS_TIPO = NFS.NFS_TIPO
    WHERE MTE.MTE_SERIE = ITM.SMM_MTE_SERIE AND MTE.MTE_SEQ = ITM.SMM_MTE_SEQ
)MTE


WHERE 
     itm.smm_vlr <> 0
    and (itm.smm_pacote IS NULL OR ( itm.smm_pacote = 'C' )) 
    and itm.smm_exec <> 'C'
    and itm.smm_sfat <> 'C'
    and itm.smm_str like '%'
    and pi.smk_ctf LIKE '%'
    AND (itm.smm_sfat IN ('a', 'f', '?', 'p', '?'))
    and substring(cast(CAST(a.osm_dthr as date) as varchar(10)),1,7) = @PERIODO
    -- AND CAST(a.osm_dthr AS DATE) BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
    -- AND A.osm_serie = '121' AND A.osm_num = '21460'
)

select 

    90                                                  AS ID_SYSTEM
    ,g.gcc_str_cod                                      AS CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,G.gcc_descr                                        AS DS_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,a.DT_ENTRADA
    ,A.DT_LANCAMENTO
    ,A.NR_ATENDIMENTO           
    ,CAST(A.nr_interno_conta AS VARCHAR(10))
        + CAST(A.NR_ATENDIMENTO AS VARCHAR(50))         AS NR_INTERNO_CONTA
    ,emp.emp_cgc                                        as CGC_CONVENIO
    ,A.cd_convenio                                      AS CD_CONVENIO
    ,conv.cnv_nome                                      as DS_CONVENIO
    ,a.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    ,A.NM_PACIENTE                                      AS NM_PACIENTE
    ,A.CD_MEDICO_SOL
    ,PSOL.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_SOLICITANTE
    ,A.CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_RESPONSAVEL
    ,PEXC.psv_nome                                      AS MEDICO_ATENDIMENTO
    ,B.str_cod                                          as CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,b.str_nome                                         as DS_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,A.NR_SEQUENCIA
    -- ,A.smm_num_pai
    -- ,smk.smk_rot                                        as DS_PROC_PRINC
    ,A.NR_PROC_INTERNO
    ,A.DS_PROC_INTERNO
    ,A.CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,A.DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,c.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,A.CD_PROCEDENCIA
    ,A.QTD                                              AS QTD_ITEM
    ,A.VL_ITEM                                          AS VL_ITEM_ORIGINAL                 
    ,A.VL_ITEM + A.VL_ITEM_AJUSTE                       AS VL_ITEM
    ,a.VL_HM
    ,a.PERC_DESCONTO
    ,a.DT_ATUALIZACAO
from prod a
inner join dbo.str b                (nolock)        on b.str_cod = a.CD_SETOR_ATENDIMENTO  
left join dbo.gcc g                (NOLOCK)        on g.gcc_str_cod = b.str_str_cod
inner join dbo.cnv conv             (NOLOCK)        on conv.cnv_cod = a.cd_convenio
inner join dbo.emp                  (nolock)        on emp_cod = conv.cnv_emp_cod  
inner join ctf     c                                on ctf_cod = a.smk_ctf  and ctf_tipo = a.smk_tipo
INNER JOIN psv     PEXC             (NOLOCK)        ON PEXC.psv_cod = A.CD_MEDICO_EXECUTANTE
INNER JOIN psv     PSOL             (NOLOCK)        ON PSOL.psv_cod = A.CD_MEDICO_SOL


WHERE C.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO IS NOT NULL
SELECT cast(day(GETDATE()) as varchar(2)) as day

source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT  
AP.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
,AP.NR_ATENDIMENTO
,AP.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
,TO_CHAR(AP.DT_ENTRADA,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_ENTRADA
,AP.DS_OBSERVACAO
FROM ATENDIMENTO_PACIENTE AP
WHERE
    ROWNUM < 5001

SELECT 	
LP.NR_ATENDIMENTO
,LP.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
,TO_CHAR(LP.DT_LAUDO,'YYYY-MM-DD') DT_LAUDO
,LP.DS_TITULO_LAUDO
,LP.NR_PRESCRICAO
,PP.IE_STATUS_EXECUCAO
,LP.NR_LAUDO
,LP.NR_SEQUENCIA
,C.CD_PESSOA_FISICA AS CD_MEDICO
,med_resp.cd_pessoa_fisica AS CD_MEDICO_RESP
,LP.DS_LAUDO
,PP.NR_SEQ_PROC_INTERNO
--,PP.CD_PROCEDIMENTO
--,PROC_INTERNO	DS_PROC_EXAME
,TO_CHAR(PP.DT_BAIXA,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_BAIXA
FROM LAUDO_PACIENTE LP
LEFT JOIN PRESCR_MEDICA C ON LP.NR_PRESCRICAO = C.NR_PRESCRICAO 
LEFT JOIN PRESCR_PROCEDIMENTO PP ON PP.NR_PRESCRICAO = LP.NR_PRESCRICAO
LEFT JOIN MEDICO MED_RESP ON med_resp.cd_pessoa_fisica = LP.CD_MEDICO_RESP
LEFT JOIN MEDICO MED ON MED.CD_PESSOA_FISICA = C.CD_MEDICO
WHERE TO_CHAR(LP.DT_LAUDO,'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN '2021-09-01' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT 
A.NR_SEQUENCIA
,B.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
,B.NR_ATENDIMENTO
,B.CD_PROFISSIONAL
--,B.CD_DOENCA
,A.NR_PROC_INTERNO
,A.QT_EXAME
--,A.NR_SEQ_APRESENT
,A.IE_LADO
,A.DS_JUSTIFICATIVA
,TO_CHAR(B.DT_SOLICITACAO,'YYYY-MM-DD') DT_SOLICITACAO
FROM pedido_exame_externo_item A
INNER JOIN PEDIDO_EXAME_EXTERNO B ON A.NR_SEQ_PEDIDO = B.NR_SEQUENCIA 
--WHERE A.NR_SEQ_PEDIDO = 169
WHERE ROWNUM < 5001 
--TO_CHAR(B.DT_SOLICITACAO,'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN '2021-09-01' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT 
    MAT.CD_MATERIAL
    ,MAT.DS_MATERIAL
    ,MAT.DS_REDUZIDA
    ,'TRUE' AS IE_SITUACAO
FROM MATERIAL MAT
WHERE MAT.IE_SITUACAO = 'A'

SELECT 
    PA.NR_SEQUENCIA
   ,PA.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
   ,PA.NR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,PA.DS_MEDIC_NAO_CAD
--    ,PA.IE_INTENSIDADE
    ,PA.CD_MATERIAL
    ,PA.IE_CONFIRMACAO
    ,CASE
        WHEN PA.IE_NEGA_ALERGIAS = 'N' THEN 'FALSE'
        WHEN PA.IE_NEGA_ALERGIAS = 'S' THEN 'TRUE'
     END IE_NEGA_ALERGIAS       
    ,TO_CHAR(PA.DT_REGISTRO,'YYYY-MM-DD') DT_REGISTRO
FROM paciente_alergia PA
--WHERE PA.DS_MEDIC_NAO_CAD IS NOT NULL

WITH COMPL_PESSOA AS (
SELECT 
CPF.*
FROM COMPL_PESSOA_FISICA CPF
WHERE CPF.CD_CEP IS NOT NULL

)
,TRATADO_COMPL AS(

SELECT
    TMP.*
FROM(
    SELECT
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.CD_PESSOA_FISICA ORDER BY A.NR_SEQUENCIA DESC) ID_LINHA
    ,A.*
    FROM COMPL_PESSOA A
)TMP
WHERE TMP.ID_LINHA = 1
)

SELECT
TC.NM_CONTATO 
,TC.DS_COMPLEMENTO 
,TC.NR_ENDERECO 
,PF.DS_CATEGORIA_CNH 
,TC.CD_MUNICIPIO_IBGE 
,PF.NR_SEQ_COR_PELE 
,TC.NR_TELEFONE 
--,TC.NR_SEQ_PAIS
,CASE
    WHEN UPPER(P.NM_PAIS) = 'BRASIL' THEN 'BRAZIL'
        ELSE UPPER(P.NM_PAIS)
 END NM_PAIS   
,PF.NR_REG_GERAL_ESTRANG 
,PF.NR_CPF 
,PF.IE_ESTADO_CIVIL 
,OBTER_NOME_SOBRENOME_PESSOA(PF.CD_PESSOA_FISICA,'SC') LASTNAME 
,TC.SG_ESTADO 
,PF.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO 
,TC.DS_ENDERECO 
,PF.NR_PRONTUARIO 
,PF.IE_SEXO 
,TC.DS_EMAIL 
,TO_CHAR(PF.DT_REVISAO,'YYYY-MM-DD')    AS DT_REVISAO 
,TC.NR_TELEFONE_CELULAR 
,PF.CD_PESSOA_FISICA 
,CASE
    WHEN TC.IE_OBRIGA_EMAIL = 'N' THEN 'FALSE'
    WHEN TC.IE_OBRIGA_EMAIL = 'S' THEN 'TRUE'
END IE_OBRIGA_EMAIL
,TC.DS_BAIRRO 
,CASE
   WHEN TC.DS_EMAIL = NULL THEN 'TRUE'   
END IE_NAO_POSSUI_EMAIL
,SUBSTR(PF.NM_PESSOA_FISICA,1,(INSTR(PF.NM_PESSOA_FISICA, ' ' , 1 , 1 ) -1 )) FIRSTNAME
,TC.DS_FONE_ADIC 
,PF.NM_USUARIO_REVISAO 
,TC.CD_PROFISSAO 
,REPLACE(OBTER_CEP_MASCARA(TC.CD_CEP),'.','')   as CD_CEP 
,PF.NR_MATRICULA_NASC
,TO_CHAR(PF.DT_NASCIMENTO,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_NASCIMENTO
,PF.CD_NACIONALIDADE 
FROM PESSOA_FISICA PF
LEFT JOIN TRATADO_COMPL TC ON TC.CD_PESSOA_FISICA = PF.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
LEFT JOIN PAIS P ON P.NR_SEQUENCIA = TC.nr_seq_pais
WHERE ROWNUM < 5001

SELECT
UF_CRM 
,NR_CRM 
,NM_GUERRA 
,cd_pessoa_fisica

,CASE
    WHEN IE_SITUACAO = 'A' THEN 'TRUE'
    --WHEN IE_SITUACAO = 'I' THEN 'FALSE'
 END IE_SITUACAO   
FROM MEDICO
WHERE IE_SITUACAO = 'A'

SELECT
cd_pessoa_fisica
,CD_ESPECIALIDADE
,NR_SEQ_PRIORIDADE
,NR_RQE
FROM MEDICO_ESPECIALIDADE ME

WITH FILTRO_CIR AS(
/*FILTRO DE PROCEDIMENTO QUE CLASSIFICA O PROGRAMA CARE*/
SELECT DISTINCT
    P.CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,P.DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,'Cirurgia' as grupo_proc
FROM PROCEDIMENTO P
WHERE UPPER(P.DS_PROCEDIMENTO) LIKE '%ANTIANGIO%'   OR UPPER(P.DS_PROCEDIMENTO) LIKE '%INTRAVITREA%'

)
, FITLRO_CONS_EX AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        P.CD_PROCEDIMENTO
        ,CASE
            WHEN P.CD_PROCEDIMENTO IN (10014,10101012) THEN 'Consultas'
                ELSE 'Exames'
             END grupo_proc
         ,p.ds_procedimento    
        --,decode(upper(GP.ds_grupo_proc),'CONSULTAS',GP.DS_GRUPO_PROC,'Exames') grupo_proc
    FROM PROCEDIMENTO P
    --INNER JOIN grupo_proc GP ON gp.cd_grupo_proc = p.cd_grupo_proc
    WHERE P.CD_PROCEDIMENTO IN (10014
                                ,10101012
                                ,41501144
                                ,41301315
                                ,41301013
                                ,50010093
                                ,41301250
                                ,41301420
                                ,50010131
                                ,50010123
    )
    AND UPPER(p.ie_situacao) = 'A'

)

,PROC AS (
    SELECT
        a.cd_procedimento
        ,a.grupo_proc
    FROM FILTRO_CIR A
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT
        a.cd_procedimento
        ,a.grupo_proc
    FROM FITLRO_CONS_EX A
    
)

, PAC_CARE AS(
SELECT DISTINCT
    AP.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
FROM PROCEDIMENTO_PACIENTE PP
INNER JOIN ATENDIMENTO_PACIENTE AP ON AP.NR_ATENDIMENTO = PP.NR_ATENDIMENTO
INNER JOIN FILTRO_CIR F ON F.CD_PROCEDIMENTO = PP.CD_PROCEDIMENTO

)

SELECT 
    1 as ID_SYS
    ,EMP.CD_EMPRESA
    ,EMP.DS_NOME_CURTO      AS SHORT_EMPRESA
    ,ESTAB.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
    ,ESTAB.NM_FANTASIA_ESTAB
    ,AP.IE_TIPO_ATENDIMENTO
    ,PP.NR_ATENDIMENTO
    ,AP.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
    ,PF.NM_PESSOA_FISICA
    ,DIAG.CD_DOENCA
    ,DIAG.DS_DOENCA_CID
    ,y.grupo_proc
    ,PP.CD_CONVENIO
    ,PP.CD_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
    ,MED.NM_GUERRA  as NM_MEDICO
    ,MED.IE_CORPO_CLINICO
    ,TRUNC(AP.DT_ENTRADA)     AS DT_ENTRADA
    ,TRUNC(PP.DT_PROCEDIMENTO) AS DT_PROCEDIMENTO 
    ,PP.CD_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,P.DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,PP.QT_PROCEDIMENTO
    ,PP.VL_PROCEDIMENTO
FROM PROCEDIMENTO_PACIENTE PP
INNER JOIN ATENDIMENTO_PACIENTE AP ON AP.NR_ATENDIMENTO = PP.NR_ATENDIMENTO
INNER JOIN PAC_CARE X ON X.CD_PESSOA_FISICA = AP.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
INNER JOIN PESSOA_FISICA PF ON PF.CD_PESSOA_FISICA = AP.CD_PESSOA_FISICA
INNER JOIN PROC Y   ON Y.CD_PROCEDIMENTO = PP.CD_PROCEDIMENTO
INNER JOIN ESTABELECIMENTO ESTAB ON ESTAB.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO = AP.CD_ESTABELECIMENTO
INNER JOIN MEDICO MED ON MED.CD_PESSOA_FISICA = PP.CD_MEDICO_EXECUTOR
INNER JOIN EMPRESA EMP ON EMP.CD_EMPRESA = ESTAB.CD_EMPRESA

OUTER APPLY(
    SELECT
        P.DS_PROCEDIMENTO
    FROM PROCEDIMENTO P
    WHERE P.CD_PROCEDIMENTO = PP.CD_PROCEDIMENTO AND ROWNUM = 1
)P

OUTER APPLY(
    SELECT
        TMP.*
    FROM(    
        SELECT 
            DD.NR_ATENDIMENTO
            ,DD.CD_DOENCA
            ,CD.DS_DOENCA_CID
            ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY DD.NR_ATENDIMENTO ORDER BY DD.DT_ATUALIZACAO desc) ID_LINHA
        FROM diagnostico_doenca DD
        LEFT JOIN CID_DOENCA CD ON CD.CD_DOENCA_CID = DD.CD_DOENCA
        WHERE DD.IE_CLASSIFICACAO_DOENCA = 'P'
    )TMP
    WHERE TMP.ID_LINHA = 1
        AND TMP.NR_ATENDIMENTO = AP.NR_ATENDIMENTO

)DIAG

WHERE AP.IE_TIPO_ATENDIMENTO <> 3
        AND AP.CD_PESSOA_FISICA <> 346
